name: St. Martin's Island
description: St. Martin's Island is a small island in the northeastern part of the Bay of Bengal,

name: The Sundarbans
description: Here you will find Bengal tigers stalking the mangroves as well as rhesus macaques swinging in the canopies

name: Sreemangal
description: Srimangal is the tea-growing capital of Bangladesh and the area is a riot of different hues of green

name: Rangamati
description: The town sits on the banks of Kaptai Lake which is known for its blue and green waters as well as the woodlands that surround it

description: This little town in the far south-east of Bangladesh is known for its stunning beach which stretches for an amazing 120 kilometers from north to south along the side of the balmy Indian Ocean

name: Bandarban
description: Surrounded by the Muranja, Wayla, and Chimbook mountains that rise to nearly 1,000 meters above sea level is the stunning town of Bandarban
